mods.abstract: (Transferred originally from Lindsley, Phillip then to Johnson, Sarah. Lindsley bought the lot in 1845, Johnson in 1914. It is not certain when Crosth; 9; 5; 10.0x40.0; Baker, Lucy A. Crosthwait 1843-1886; Crosthwait, A.L. 1839-1923; Crosthwait, Helen Harley 1841-1911; Crosthwait, John H. 1869-1911; Crosthwait, Lena 1899-1825; Crosthwait, Melinda L. 1800-1883; Crosthwait, Thomas L. 1880-1900; S.J. (Sarah Johnson ?); D.H.C.
